version.added: FileServe now auto-detects mobile devices (including iOS) running vSceneViewer over the network and can connect to them without having to manually push a vFileServeHost.txt file to the device.
It is now possible to view the last scene exported by vForge inside the vSceneViewer
Extended -af Anisotropic filtering command line parameter to take the filtering level as a second parameter. [#619-8331017]
version.fixed: -af Anisotropic filtering command line parameter was not working. [#619-8331017]
version.added: Added command-line parameter -varkeys, which can be used to add custom variant keys for testing purposes.

version.changed: Replaced old Sound Plugin with new Fmod Plugin.

version.fixed: vSceneViewer crash fixed when Locked Screen while starting scene viewer. [HS:#4960]
-nocam command line parameter was not working
Fixed conversion to multi-byte characters of the scene that was being opened [#3001].

version.added: New command line parameter "adapter x" with x specifying the adapter index

version.changed: vSceneViewer now can open the file without type argument.
version.fixed: Path including asian language wasn't handled properly [#1989]
version.added: Added "WASD" control to the vScene Viewer and the controls "Q" and "E" to move the camera down and up [#2053]
Dedicated changelog for the vScene Viewer
